overview: Christy Canyon finds herself institutionalized because she is addicted to talking dirty. Not only isn't she getting any better-patients and doctors are so stimulated by her hot talk that they 're not getting any better either. It will be up to Dr. Loveberg to save poor Christy - - if that damn electroshock therapy doesn't get her first ! Join Brilliant new director Ralph Parfait- with superstar Christy Canyon- and a cast of crazies in the dirtiest film to come out of this loony bin in along- long while. Oral Addiction. Watch it. Then wash your mouth out with tape cleaner.
tagline: She can't control her mouth. That can be good and bad.
title: Oral Addiction
